name: How Deep Does This Go? (SafetyDad)
description:
You are the only one who can see the whole picture.

You need to paint that picture by descending into madness, build your conspiracy board to illustrate the connections between your pieces of evidences sent in by your informant network. 

How Deep Does This Go is a game made to capture the essence of raving conspiracy theorists in movies in a fun and engaging puzzle game. It keeps the high octane feeling while making you feel like putting together the grand scheme and with a touch of insanity. Each wave will ask the player to find a way to make the evidence fit. Tag the connections and mark the red herrings. Originally a game jam game, this version of How Deep Does This Go has been expanded and polished for release. Featuring enhanced gameplay, new art,music and sound effects, and a mystery beyond solving! Download it now and see if you can find out

How Deep Does This Go?

From January 3rd to January 10th. Anybody who leaves a comment can suggest a name or newspaper headline to be added to the game by leaving a comment on the here on the Itch Page. Free for the next month!

Art by Emmalie Hall
Music by Jarod Perez
Design and Programming by Alex Rose
